featured.text: They travel entirely along tree branches and as a group when “commuting” between two vines, laying down trails of pheromone (a locations, such as from their nesting site to their chemical substance) behind them so that other feeding ground.
(E) They change their nesting sites from time to time.

definition.zh_def: 將物體或生物放置在其他物體或生物內部的行為或狀態。
definition.en_def: The act or state of placing objects or organisms inside one another.
definition.example: The birds are nesting in the trees to raise their young.
